author: Justin Wise
title: Poll: More than 70 percent of Americans support coronavirus stay-at-home orders
description: An overwhelming majority of Americans say that stay-at-home orders issued throughout the U.S. in response to the coronavirus outbreak should remain in place until health experts say it is safe to reopen, according to a ...
content:
An overwhelming majority of Americans say that stay-at-home orders issued throughout the U.S. in response to the coronavirus outbreak should remain in place until health experts say it is safe to reopen, according to a new poll.
The Reuters-Ipsos survey rele… [+2279 chars]
